value:
I think I saw Lady Nifl in a swimsuit
just now... But that would be silly,
wouldn't it?

This tropical ocean is so calm and
beautiful... Nifl's seas are full of
ice. It's far too cold to swim.

Oh, would you like to share this
drink with me? It's quite refreshing
on such a hot day!

Ylgr told me before how fantastically
vivid Askr's ocean is. I'm happy I get
to see it myself!

I've never needed to dress for hot
weather before... I'm a little out of
my element at the beach.

I am Fjorm of Nifl, the Kingdom of
Ice. I come bearing frozen treats
from $Nf!

It's nice to be so warm for a change.
It looks like I'm enjoying summertime
more than I thought I would!

I can keep going! I think I'm finally
getting used to the heat.

Whew, I feel a little faint... Do you
think I overdid it today?

Oh, thank you! Do you think this will
help me become a better swimmer?

I am Fjorm, second princess of Nifl.
Wow, the summer sun is so bright
and warm...

Summoner, look, the sun is starting to
set. You can see its colors reflected
in the water. How beautiful...$k$pThank you for teaching me to swim
today. I was a little nervous, but the
water actually felt very nice.$k$pThe ocean in Nifl is freezing cold and
dangerous to swim in, so it's always
been a scary place for me.$k$pBut I love the ocean now thanks
to you! I never thought it could be
so much fun.$k$pI know I will treasure the memories
we made this summer for the rest
of my life!
Ow, ow, ow, ow!
Waves of ice!
Too cold?
Feeling good?
A wonderful summer.
I need some shade...
The sun is so hot! I feel like I'll just melt away.
*gasp* That's cold—even for me!
Ah...the sun is really beating down, isn't it? I don't feel well. I hope I'm not spoiling the fun.
I'm used to covering up… I've never dressed this way before.
Isn't this beach ball adorable? Let's watch it fly!
The ocean is so beautiful... I'll carry this warmth with me for the rest of my days.
Um... I've never been swimming. I might look a little...awkward. You're not going to laugh, are you?
So hot...
I feel faint...
Here I go!
